mapper.sql: ID, ITEMCODE, ITEMNAME, PLANNEDPRICE, SPECIFICATIONS, TYPE, MEASUREMENTUNIT, STATUS, OPERATORID, OPERATIONTIME, INVALIDATEJOBINT, INVALIDATENAME, INVALIDATETIME
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum rn,pac.*,emp.empname as operatorqq,emp.empname as invalidatejobqq from Pac_Packaging pac,SY_EMP emp and pac.operatorid=emp.id
and pac.itemcode like concat(concat('%',#{itemcode}),'%')
and pac.itemname like concat(concat('%',#{itemname}),'%')
and pac.measurementunit like concat(concat('%',#{measurementunit}),'%')
and emp.empname like concat(concat('%',#{operatorqq}),'%')
and emp.empname like concat(concat('%',#{invalidatejobqq}),'%')
) where rn between #{page} and #{rows}

select count(*) from ( select rownum rn,pac.*,emp.empname as operatorqq,emp.empname as invalidatejobqq from Pac_Packaging pac,SY_EMP emp and pac.operatorid=emp.id
and pac.itemcode like concat(concat('%',#{itemcode}),'%')
and pac.itemname like concat(concat('%',#{itemname}),'%')
and pac.measurementunit like concat(concat('%',#{measurementunit}),'%')
and emp.empname like concat(concat('%',#{operatorqq}),'%')
and emp.empname like concat(concat('%',#{invalidatejobqq}),'%')
)
mapper.insert: insert into BOS.PAC_PACKAGING values (pacid.nextval, concat('WP',pacid.nextval), #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plannedprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{measurementunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sysdate, #{invalidatejobint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invalidatename,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sysdate)

insert into BOS.PAC_PACKAGING

mapper.update:
update BOS.PAC_PACKAGING
ITEMCODE = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEMNAME = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLANNEDPRICE = #{plannedprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPECIFICATIONS = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MEASUREMENTUNIT = #{measurementunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OPERATIONTIME = #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVALIDATEJOBINT = #{invalidatejobint,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVALIDATENAME = #{invalidatename,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVALIDATETIME = #{invalidatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.PAC_PACKAGING set ITEMCODE = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEMNAME = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANNEDPRICE = #{plannedprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPECIFICATIONS = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEASUREMENTUNIT = #{measurementunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERATORID = #{operatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPERATIONTIME = #{operationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVALIDATEJOBINT = #{invalidatejobint,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVALIDATENAME = #{invalidatename,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVALIDATETIME = #{invalidatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
